proc readPfmImage(stream: Stream): HdrImage {.
    ...raises: [IOError, OSError, InvalidPfmFileFormat, Exception],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Read a pfm image as a stream. Return a HdrImage object containing the image. If an error occurs, raise a InvalidPfmFileFormat exception.   Source   Edit

proc writePfmImage(img: HdrImage; stream: Stream; endianness: float32 = -1.0) {.
    ...raises: [IOError, OSError, ValueError], tags: [WriteIOEffect].}
Write the image in a PFM file. The stream parameter must be a I/O stream. The parameter endianness specifies the byte endianness to be used in the file.   Source   Edit
